channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-22170] from_unixtime and unix_timestamp should use user session time zone
item.description: According to documentation, that is the expected behavior (since session time zone was not present, system time zone was being used previously). This was incorrectly changed by HIVE-12192 / HIVE-20007. This JIRA should fix this issue.
item.summary: from_unixtime and unix_timestamp should use user session time zone

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
